Package controller

Class AddPart

java.lang.Object
controller.AddPart
public class AddPart extends Object
AddPart controls the add part view. addPartSaveButton(): saves a new part in an list addPartCancelButton(): cancels execution returns to main view addPartinHouse(): changes label's text to Machine ID addPartOutsourced(): changes label's text to Company Name RUNTIME_ERROR: ran into "cannot find symbol" error bc I misspelled a variable FUTURE_ENHANCEMENTS: Improve UI for the toggle buttons
